attributes.action: send a Scottish Government Minister to the Climate Talks in Copenhagen in December 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Devolution means little in practice, when a UK Prime Minister can prevent a Scottish Government Minister from obtaining a place at the Copenhagen Summit on Climate Change. Scotland has a strong commitment to environmental issues. Please change your mind and reserve a seat for a Scottish Minister at the Summit.
